instancePort.description: The port on the instance to route to

instanceProtocol.description:
The protocol to use to the instance. Valid
values are `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, `TCP`, or `SSL`

lbPort.description: The port to listen on for the load balancer

lbProtocol.description:
The protocol to listen on. Valid values are `HTTP`,
`HTTPS`, `TCP`, or `SSL`

sslCertificateId.description:
The ARN of an SSL certificate you have
uploaded to AWS IAM. **Note ECDSA-specific restrictions below.  Only valid when `lb_protocol` is either HTTPS or SSL**
